text: The 1979 Cardiff City Council election was held on Thursday 3 May 1979 to elect councillors to Cardiff District Council (later to become known as Cardiff City Council) in Cardiff, Wales. It took place on the same day as other council elections in the United Kingdom. The 1976 election saw the Conservative Party lose their majority to the Labour Party. ==Background== 199 Candidates from 5 parties ran. 1 Independent also ran in the Riverside ward was who was formerly of the Ratepayers Association. Despite being an incumbent Councillor he lost. The Conservative party ran a full slate of candidates.
